alert.note: Alert for Clark; Ford; Gray; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:27PM CDT until June 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FORD...MEADE...SOUTHEASTERN GRAY AND WESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Howell to near Fowler to 10 miles south of Meade State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Minneola. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
